about_the_game:
THE Cursor Game is a hard casual game where you will have to advance through the levels without touching the red. Simple enough right?

30 Levels!

There are 30 levels to beat in THE Cursor Game, Will you be able to overcome them all?

Customize your cursor!

In THE Cursor Game there are 12 unlockable skins for your cursor.

Make a New Record!

Outdo yourself and the rest of the world by improving your times.
Share your best run with #THECursorGame and compare to others!

Who will be THE Cursor Master?

name: THE Cursor Game Demo
short_description: Are you ready for the challenge? Guide your cursor through 30 difficult levels. Test your patience and precision in this casual hard game! Share your best times with #THECursorGame and become THE Cursor Master.
